extension.name: Workspacer
extension.description: For Symphony 2.5+. Files in the Workspace folder can be managed and edited.

releases.release: - Fixed faulty URLs leading to page not found.
- Editor save & delete buttons moved to bottom of window. - Save-as button added to editor, filename box removed. - Several bugs fixed.
- Editor caret can be placed on last line in Blink-based browsers. - Editor window scrolls when text is entered on bottom line.
- Height of editor is set to fit available space in browser window. - 'Save' and 'delete' buttons moved to page context area.
- Saving files did not always work. Alterations made to JS code.
